survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Parking Payment Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction with contactless parking payment solutions, including ease of use, reliability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use contactless parking payment solutions?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a contactless parking payment solution? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a contactless parking payment solution? (Select all that apply)
